trait.name: Antimagic Susceptibility
entries: The trident is {@condition incapacitated} while in the area of an {@spell antimagic field}. If targeted by {@spell dispel magic}, the trident must succeed on a Constitution saving throw against the caster's spell save DC or fall {@condition unconscious} for 1 minute.

trait.name: False Appearance
entries: While the trident remains motionless and isn't flying, it is indistinguishable from a normal trident.

action.name: Trident
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d8 + 1}) piercing damage.
